document_data.name: Dispel Chaos
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dispel chaos''''' was an [[abjuration]] spell that worked exactly like ''[[dispel evil]]'' except it affected chaotic spells and creatures instead of evil ones.
document_data.Effects: The effects of this spell were the same as ''[[dispel evil]]'' except the aura surrounding the spellcaster was a solid, unwavering blue and made of lawful energy.
document_data.Components: Verbal and somatic components were required to cast this spell plus the caster's (un)[[holy symbol]] or [[divine focus]].
document_data.History: [[Justiciar of Tyr|Justiciars of Tyr]], [[Nar demonbinder]]s, and [[Olin Gisir]] were known to use this spell.<ref><ref><ref>
